<template>
  <HeadderTop/>
  <MainContent/>
</template>

<script>    
export default {
    data(){
        return {
            CoTrang: null,
            HanhDong: null,
            HoatHinh: null,
            KinhDi: null,
            TinhCam: null,
            TatCa: [],
        }
    },
    created(){ 
        fetch("https://api.apify.com/v2/key-value-stores/QubTry45OOCkTyohU/records/LATEST?fbclid=IwAR2CQrkSmpdayjUmuQDm2BmuZtaSBm0ol5PoNNEvzxo5UI8AwacyymiJ3B8")
        .then((response)=>response.json())
        .then((data)=>(this.TatCa = data.phim.phimchieurap))
        // .then(()=>{ console.log(this.TatCa)})
        .then((data)=>(data.forEach((TC)=>{
            if(TC.category==="Phim tình cảm"){
            this.TinhCam.push(TC)
           }
            console.log(this.TinhCam)
        }) ))
               
    },
    computed:{
        
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
